coffee.details: The campus coffee bar is open from 8 AM to 8 PM daily.

follow_ups.reply: The coffee bar offers coffee, tea, and pastries.
The coffee bar is located in the student center.

library.details: The library is open from 9 AM to 10 PM daily.

follow_ups.reply: Library memberships are free for all students.
Study rooms can be booked online for group study.

admissions.details: Admissions are open! Visit the admissions office or website for more details.

follow_ups.reply: You need your transcript, ID, and a completed application form.

sports.details: Our sports facilities include a gym, swimming pool, and basketball courts.

follow_ups.reply: Access to sports facilities requires a valid student ID.
The gym schedule is available on the university website.

exam.details: The exam schedule will be published on the university's website next week.

follow_ups.reply: Exam locations will be included in the schedule.
Make sure to bring your ID and required stationery for exams.
